name: Legitimate Mining Co.
description:
Work as a robot to serve a very legitimate company. Scan the ground for valuable resources to make a living. Try to find a way to escape your existence using the money you earn at your job.

Made in 1 week for the Brackeys 2022.1 Game Jam. 

WASD to move

Space to Jump

E - switch between scanner and laser

Q - Quest/Inventory information

Mouse to look/interact with NPC
